statements: SELECT * FROM luxury_properties
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 1000000
SELECT property_name, location, size_sqft FROM luxury_properties WHERE location = 'Beverly Hills'
SELECT property_type, location, amenities->>'pool' AS has_pool FROM luxury_properties WHERE bedrooms >= 5
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE features->>'garden' = 'true' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE price >= 100000 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE bedrooms >= 3 AND bathrooms >= 2 ORDER BY bedrooms DESC, bathrooms ASC
SELECT property_name, size_sqft, amenities FROM luxury_properties WHERE size_sqft >= 3000 AND location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY size_sqft DESC
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type, location, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE location LIKE '%Beach'
SELECT property_name, bedrooms, bathrooms, features FROM luxury_properties WHERE features->>'swimming_pool' = 'Yes' ORDER BY bedrooms ASC
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties;
SELECT id, address, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 1000000;
SELECT address, bedrooms, bathrooms FROM luxury_properties WHERE bedrooms = 4;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, address, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE price BETWEEN 500000 AND 750000;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 1000000 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT property_id, location FROM luxury_properties WHERE location = 'Malibu' AND price < 500000 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT property_id, location, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE location = 'Beverly Hills' OR location = 'Bel Air' LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(property_id) AS total_properties FROM luxury_properties WHERE price BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM luxury_properties
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY property_name ASC
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_type = 'Villa' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT property_name, location, amenities FROM luxury_properties WHERE location = 'Malibu'
SELECT * FROM property_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT property_name, price, description FROM luxury_properties WHERE features @> ARRAY['Infinity Pool']
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, price, description FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_type = 'Villa' AND amenities @> ARRAY['pool'] ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_name, location, price, features FROM luxury_properties WHERE location LIKE 'Beverly Hills%' OR location LIKE 'Malibu%' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT property_name, location, price, description FROM luxury_properties WHERE price BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000 AND amenities @> ARRAY['ocean view'] ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM property_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT property_name, location, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_type = 'Villa' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM amenities WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT amenity_name FROM amenities WHERE amenity_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT property_name, feature_name FROM luxury_properties INNER JOIN features ON luxury_properties.property_id = features.feature_id;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY property_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_name, property_type, price FROM luxury_properties WHERE location = 'Miami' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT lp.property_name, a.amenity_name FROM luxury_properties lp INNER JOIN property_amenities pa ON lp.property_id = pa.property_id INNER JOIN amenities a ON pa.amenity_id = a.amenity_id WHERE a.description LIKE '%pool%';
SELECT lp.property_name, f.feature_name FROM luxury_properties lp LEFT JOIN features f ON lp.property_type = f.feature_type;
SELECT * FROM luxury_properties WHERE property_type IN ('Villa', 'Mansion') AND price BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Luxury_Property_Listings;
SELECT property_name, property_type, price FROM Luxury_Property_Listings WHERE price >= 1000000;
SELECT amenities FROM Luxury_Property_Amenities WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM Luxury_Property_Features ORDER BY feature_name DESC;
SELECT image_url FROM Luxury_Property_Photos WHERE property_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Luxury_Property_Listings WHERE price > 100000 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, address, price FROM Luxury_Property_Listings WHERE bedrooms >= 4 AND bathrooms >= 3
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM Luxury_Property_Listings WHERE status = 'available'
SELECT * FROM Luxury_Property_Photos p JOIN Luxury_Property_Listings l ON p.property_id = l.id WHERE l.price > 500000 ORDER BY l.price DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT l.id, l.address, a.amenity_name FROM Luxury_Property_Listings l JOIN Luxury_Property_Amenities a ON l.id = a.property_id WHERE a.amenity_type = 'pool'
